definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: And after riding all over the desert I’m now a 1)bandit.
sentences.chinese: 騎馬走過整個大漠後，現在我變成了強盜。
前往花園幽徑，莫往飛沙大漠。

sentences.english: Guests can also ride camel, appreciate at the vast desert landscape.
sentences.chinese: 客人也可自費騎駝，欣賞浩瀚無垠的大漠風光。

sentences.english: The Shifting Sands are the impassable deserts surrounding the Land of Oz.
sentences.chinese: 在書中，圍繞在奧茲國周邊的大漠流沙是不可穿越的。

sentences.english: Desert Wind and Smoke, the color of good and evil in a world war, about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 大漠風煙間，一場天地變色的正邪之戰，即將展開。

sentences.english: And they once lived happily and freely in the desert for awhile.
sentences.chinese: 嬌龍與羅小虎在大漠中無憂無慮地生活了一段時間。

sentences.english: The vertical smoke is lonely in the great desert.
sentences.chinese: 垂直的煙在大漠中是孤獨的。

sentences.english: However, Dunhuang is located in the hinterland of the great desert.
sentences.chinese: 然而，敦煌處在大漠的腹地。

definition: Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
Tianshan mountain range between XinJiang and Mongolia and Kyrgyzstan
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
